chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (c n m : nat) (v : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (g : naryFunc (S m)), extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n (S m) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) (evalConstFunc n c) m v) g) (evalComposeFunc n m v (g c))

Premises:

naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, t A n -> Type), P 0 (nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : t A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, t A n -> Prop), P 0 (nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t :
evalComposeFunc : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> naryFunc m -> naryFunc n
extEqual : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc n -> Prop
replaceCompose2 : forall (n : nat) (a b a' b' : naryFunc n) (c c' : naryFunc 2), extEqual n a a' -> extEqual n b b' -> extEqual 2 c c' -> extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n 2 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) a 1 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) b 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc n)))) c) (evalComposeFunc n 2 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) a' 1 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) b' 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc n)))) c')
extEqualCompose : forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (f1 f2 : naryFunc m), extEqualVector n m l1 l2 -> extEqual m f1 f2 -> extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n m l1 f1) (evalComposeFunc n m l2 f2)
extEqualOneParamList : forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc (S n)) m) (c : nat), extEqualVector (S n) m l1 l2 -> extEqualVector n m (evalOneParamList n m c l1) (evalOneParamList n m c l2)
projectionListId : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (p : n <= n), extEqual n f (evalComposeFunc n n (projectionList n n p) f)
evalOneParamList : forall n m : nat, nat -> Vector.t (naryFunc (S n)) m -> Vector.t (naryFunc n) m
extEqualVector : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> Prop
evalPrimRecs : forall n m : nat, PrimRecs n m -> Vector.t (naryFunc n) m
projectionList : forall n m : nat, m <= n -> Vector.t (naryFunc n) m
extEqualVectorGeneral : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> forall m' : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m' -> Prop
PrimRec_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Type, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
extEqualVectorRefl : forall (n m : nat) (l : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m), extEqualVector n m l l
PrimRec_PrimRecs_rec : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRecs_PrimRec_ind : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P0 n n0 p
extEqualCompose2 : forall (n : nat) (f1 f2 : naryFunc n), extEqual n f1 f2 -> forall g1 g2 : naryFunc (S n), extEqual (S n) g1 g2 -> extEqual n (compose2 n f1 g1) (compose2 n f2 g2)
extEqualPrimRec : forall (n : nat) (g1 g2 : naryFunc n) (h1 h2 : naryFunc (S (S n))), extEqual n g1 g2 -> extEqual (S (S n)) h1 h2 -> extEqual (S n) (evalPrimRecFunc n g1 h1) (evalPrimRecFunc n g2 h2)
PRcons : forall n m : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRecs n m -> PrimRecs n (S m)
Znat.Nat2Z.inj_lt : forall n m : nat, n < m < -> BinInt.Z.lt (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) (BinInt.Z.of_nat m)
VectorDef.In_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), (forall (m : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P (S m) (VectorDef.cons A a m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.In a v -> P m v -> P (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.In a t -> P n t
VectorDef.In_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> SProp), (forall (m : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P (S m) (VectorDef.cons A a m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.In a v -> P m v -> P (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.In a t -> P n t
compose2 : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc (S n) -> naryFunc n

ignoreParams : forall n m : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc (m + n)
Inductive PrimRec : nat -> Set := succFunc : PrimRec 1 | zeroFunc : PrimRec 0 | projFunc : forall n m : nat, m < n -> PrimRec n | composeFunc : forall n m : nat, PrimRecs n m -> PrimRec m -> PrimRec n | primRecFunc : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRec (S (S n)) -> PrimRec (S n) with PrimRecs : nat -> nat -> Set := PRnil : forall n : nat, PrimRecs n 0 | PRcons : forall n m : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRecs n m -> PrimRecs n (S m) Arguments PrimRec _%nat_scope Arguments projFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments composeFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments primRecFunc _%nat_scope Arguments PrimRecs (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments PRnil _%nat_scope Arguments PRcons (_ _)%nat_scope
VectorDef.Exists_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> P0 m v -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.Exists P t -> P0 n t
VectorDef.Exists_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> SProp), (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> P0 m v -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.Exists P t -> P0 n t
minus_Sn_m : forall n m : nat, m <= n -> S (n - m) = S n - m
projectionListApplyParam : forall (m n c : nat) (p1 : m <= n) (p2 : m <= S n), extEqualVector n m (projectionList n m p1) (evalOneParamList n m c (projectionList (S n) m p2))
extEqualTrans : forall (n : nat) (a b c : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b c -> extEqual n a c
beq_nat_eq : forall n m : nat, true = (n =? m) -> n = m
extEqualSym : forall (n : nat) (a b : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b a
evalProjFunc : forall n m : nat, m < n -> naryFunc n
ignoreParamsIsPR : forall (n m : nat) (f : naryFunc n), isPR n f -> isPR (m + n) (ignoreParams n m f)
Bvector.Bhigh : forall n : nat, Vector.t bool (S n) -> Vector.t bool n
evalPrimRecFunc : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc (S (S n)) -> nat -> naryFunc n
Bvector.Bcons : bool -> forall n : nat, Vector.t bool n -> Vector.t bool (S n)
VectorDef.Exists2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t B n -> SProp), (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), P x1 x2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), VectorDef.Exists2 P v1 v2 -> P0 m v1 v2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) ->...-> P0 n t t0
VectorDef.Exists2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t B n -> Prop), (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), P x1 x2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), VectorDef.Exists2 P v1 v2 -> P0 m v1 v2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) ->...-> P0 n t t0
extEqualRefl : forall (n : nat) (a : naryFunc n), extEqual n a a
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (VectorDef.cons ?A a 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A))) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a (S n) v)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v where ?A : [ |- Type]

```coq
intros c n m v g.
unfold extEqual.
intros a b.
intros c c'.
intros H1 H2 H3.
apply extEqualTrans with (n := 2) (b := c) (c := c').
- unfold extEqual in H2. apply H2. apply H1.
- unfold extEqual in H3. apply H3.
Qed.```

original: intros c n m v g. unfold extEqual. intros a b. intros c c'. intros H1 H2 H3. apply extEqualTrans with (n := 2) (b := c) (c := c'). - unfold extEqual in H2. apply H2. apply H1. - unfold extEqual in H3. apply H3.
